ch0125_00_guzma/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s get wild today and beat down some
Trainers and send them flying!
ch0125_00_guzma/0601_0701_01_10:
Destroy it all! Destroy it all and beat them down
as much as you like! That’s what Team Skull’s
all about!
ch0125_00_guzma/0601_0701_02_10:
I live for beating down all those moldy, old
traditions and customs we’ve got in Alola.
ch0125_00_guzma/0601_0701_03_10:
Here on Pasio, I’m gonna find a whole new kind
of style! Yeah.
ch0125_00_guzma/0601_0702_01_10:
Traditions? Old customs? That stuff’s not gonna
help us.
ch0125_00_guzma/0601_0702_02_10:
It’s better to embrace what the winds of change
bring us.
ch0125_00_guzma/0602_0701_01_10:
I’m not the only member of Team Skull who made
it to Pasio.
ch0125_00_guzma/0602_0701_02_10:
Bet she’s off doing her own thing. Heh, not that
I’m really worried about it.
ch0125_00_guzma/0602_0701_03_10: We’ll probably end up seeing her sooner or later.
ch0125_00_guzma/0602_0702_01_10:
She and I have totally different styles when it
comes to thinking and battling.
ch0125_00_guzma/0602_0702_02_10: If I’m honest, I can never tell what she’s thinking.
ch0125_00_guzma/0602_0702_03_10: Maybe that’s why we get along so well.
ch0125_00_guzma/0603_0701_01_10:
These fancy Pokémon Center cafés sure have a
lot, but they’re still missing some important stuff!
ch0125_00_guzma/0603_0701_02_10:
They don’t have my favorite drink from back
in Alola!
ch0125_00_guzma/0603_0701_03_10:
Here on Pasio, it’s got me thinking about that taste
sometimes. Yeah.
ch0125_00_guzma/0603_0702_01_10: That drink is everywhere in Alola.
ch0125_00_guzma/0603_0702_02_10:
If you find it around here, buy one for your boy
Guzma, OK?
ch0125_00_guzma/0604_0701_01_10:
Team Skull is a home for those who have nowhere
else to go.
ch0125_00_guzma/0604_0701_02_10: Totally different from the way you think and live.
ch0125_00_guzma/0604_0701_03_10: But I think you’d actually fit in pretty well.
ch0125_00_guzma/0604_0702_01_10: I’m not only about destroying, you know.
ch0125_00_guzma/0604_0702_02_10:
Team Skull is like a home for all of my crew, and
I won’t ever let it be destroyed.
ch0125_00_guzma/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’ve got some
real great promise. Yeah. You’re different from
the others around here.
ch0125_00_guzma/0605_0701_02_10:
How about joining Team Skull and causing some
havoc with me?
ch0125_00_guzma/0605_0701_03_10: As a team, we could destroy anything we wanted.
ch0125_00_guzma/0605_0702_01_10:
When you join Team Skull, you gotta wear the
team’s mark.
ch0125_00_guzma/0605_0702_02_10:
We got shirts and masks, and some real
sweet pendants.
ch0125_00_guzma/0605_0702_03_10:
Listen, I’m offering to set you up with an outfit
I picked myself, so you better be thankful!
ch0125_00_guzma/1701_0701_02_10:
That’s a gift from big bad Guzma. You better
use it!
ch0125_00_guzma/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t go destroying that, got it?
ch0125_00_guzma/2501_0701_01_10:
Now’s the time for my vaunted partner to let
loose and destroy everything!
ch0125_00_guzma/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why we’ve both got to keep getting
stronger and stronger. Yeah!
ch0125_00_guzma/2501_0701_03_10:
So we’re gonna train again today until we’re
totally beat!
ch0125_00_guzma/2501_0702_01_10:
You and your partner make a pretty good
sync pair. Yeah. Really something, I’d say.
ch0125_00_guzma/2501_0702_02_10:
Together we could destroy it all and bring about
a new wind of change!
ch0125_00_guzma/2501_0702_03_10:
We’ll break down the walls that hold us back, and
we’ll get stronger and stronger!
ch0125_00_guzma/2511_0701_01_10: I’m the boss of Team Skull.
ch0125_00_guzma/2511_0701_02_10:
Team Skull’s made up of people who were told
they had no future. Yeah. That’s why I gotta fight
hard to give them one.
ch0125_00_guzma/2511_0701_03_10:
In the end, the wall we gotta destroy is the one
we put around ourselves...
ch0125_00_guzma/2511_0701_04_10: Until then, Team Skull’s our home, and that’s cool.
ch0125_00_guzma/2511_0702_01_10:
We’ve also got a strange kid in Team Skull who’s
less of a good-for-nothing.
ch0125_00_guzma/2511_0702_02_10: Wonder what that guy’s up to right now.
ch0125_00_guzma/3001_0701_01_10:
Yo... Lookin’ pretty groggy over there. If you
need somebody to slap you awake, I’d be happy
to oblige!
ch0125_00_guzma/3002_0701_01_10:
What? I’m just givin’ the turf a quick once-over...
Guess it’s become a habit.
ch0125_00_guzma/3003_0701_01_10:
Y’know, Pasio’s a sweet, little island. It’d be a
shame if somebody smashed it to pieces...
Heh heh, sounds like fun.
ch0125_00_guzma/3004_0701_01_10:
Me ’n’ my Pokémon gotta keep training our bodies
each day so punks like you can’t beat us down!
ch0125_00_guzma/3005_0701_01_10:
Whaddya skulkin’ around at night for, huh?
If we were in Alola, you’d already be gettin’ the
evil eye from Team Skull.
ch0125_00_guzma/3006_0701_01_10:
Ain’t it past your bedtime, kid?
Get outta here—unless you want a beatdown.
